Html:
Hi,

I'd like to ask if there is any way to select in a datePicker a month or a year with one click.

And if I can by any means change selection mode to one of the calendar properties like SelectionMode="SingleRange"

I tried using CalendarStyle but it didn't worked out.

If using a datePicker is inappropriate may be you could suggest me what control to use for my needs (selection of a range, month or year).
